org.platanios.learn.classification

Class LogisticRegressionPrediction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.classification.LogisticRegressionPrediction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<Vector,java.lang.Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression

    public class LogisticRegressionPrediction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier<Vector,java.lang.Integer>
    This abstract class provides some functionality that is common to all binary logistic regression classes. All those classes should extend this class. TODO: Add bias term.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>>
      This abstract class needs to be extended by the builders of all binary logistic regression classes.
      static class  LogisticRegressionPrediction.Builder
      The builder class for this abstract class.

      • predict

        public double[] predict(java.util.List<DataInstance<Vector,java.lang.Integer>> dataInstances)
        Predict the probabilities of the class labels being equal to 1 for a set of data instances. One probability value is provided for each data instance in the set.
        Specified by:
        predict in interface Classifier<Vector,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        dataInstances - The set of data instances for which the probabilities are computed in the form of an array.
        Returns:
        The probabilities of the class labels being equal to 1 for the given set of data instances.
